abstract: The former chairman and chief executive of the bankrupt Anglo Irish bank was arrested Friday in connection with an investigation into alleged fraud at the firm.
snippet: The former chairman and chief executive of the bankrupt Anglo Irish bank was arrested Friday in connection with an investigation into alleged fraud at the firm.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Sean FitzPatrick, the former chairman and chief executive of the bankrupt Anglo Irish Bank, was arrested Friday in connection with an investigation into alleged fraud at the firm, according to a person familiar with the situation.

headline.main: Former Chairman of Anglo Irish Bank Arrested
